Use Farcaster ​

Get an invite ​

An invitation is required to start posting. There are three ways to get one:

  1. Message @dwr on Twitter.
  2. Ask an existing user for an invite.
  3. Run a Farcaster Hub on mainnet.

Invites are limited to keep out spammy accounts. If you're a real person who engages on social media or likes writing code, you'll have no problem getting an invite.

We're working on opening up the system so that anyone can register. We expect this to be ready within a year.
